title: Random delays?
body: I don't know if it is just me but I have been having many a problem with playing in game for the past few days. My ping has gone about 10 lower than usual and my frames are fine yet every so often I get massive delays and packet loss while in game. I'll be walking to lane and the health bars will disappear, things will skate around the map and nothing will look right, then everything will catch up and I would of died and I will be in an entirely different place than what I was looking at? Please tell me that isn't just me ;-; It's really annoying. I have small reaction delays as well and I don't know how to fix it or who I should be contacting about it. Overwatch works properly, Youtube works better than before, it's only League that dicks up.  I genuinely do not know how I am meant to fix this or anything and it does me a great sadden.

replies.body:
Take a look at this first, if your ISP is the problem this should make it pretty clear:
https://lagreport.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/

Follow thorugh the steps in this post next, it fixes most issues not caused on your ISPs end:
https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/LbPY3Rpr-experiencing-a-tech-problem-find-the-common-fixes-here#connection

All else fails submit as ticket to player support detailing your issue:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
